flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This project uses conductive thread and tape to make a wearable, light-up cuff. This technique is a great way to get started with constructing circuits and can be customized in many different ways.
guide.introduction_rendered: This project uses conductive thread and tape to make a wearable, light-up cuff. This technique is a great way to get started with constructing circuits and can be customized in many different ways.
guide.summary: Make a cuff bracelet that lights up!
guide.title: Sewn Circuit LED Cuff
